short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Crowd Pusher Hyper Casual Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you good at math? If so, then you'll love Crowd Pusher! This math-based platformer challenges you to solve equations in order to move your army forward.

The game is simple to play. Use your mouse to move the stickman character around the screen. When you encounter an equation, solve it correctly to create a new soldier. The more soldiers you have, the stronger your army will be.

The game is challenging but rewarding. As you progress through the levels, the equations will become more difficult. But don't worry, you can always skip the challenging levels if you're feeling stuck.

So what are you waiting for? Start playing Crowd Pusher today and test your math skills!

Features:

Math-based gameplay
Simple controls
Challenging levels
Beautiful graphics
Easy to skip challenging levels
3D environment

How to Play:

Use your mouse to move the stickman character around the screen.
When you encounter an equation, solve it correctly to create a new soldier.
The more soldiers you have, the stronger your army will be.
Progress through the levels and challenge yourself to solve the most difficult equations.
Have fun!

-Play others games on the top-left menu.
